A commentarie of M. Iohn Caluine, vpon the Epistle to the Colossians. And translated into English by R.V. Commentarii in quatuor Pauli epistolas. English. Selections Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564. Vaux, Robert.
[12], 86 p.
Printed by Thomas Purfoote, and are to be sold at his shop ouer against S. Sepulchers Church, At London : [1581]
R.V. = Robert Vaux. A translation of part of: Commentarii in quatuor Pauli epistolas. Publication date from STC. Usually found bound with STC 4401. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[12], 86 p.
Printed by Thomas Purfoote, and are to be sold at his shop ouer against S. Sepulchers Church, At London : [1581]
